amendment.description: Amendment sought increase funding for the HOPE VI public housing revitalization program by $100 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment increase the funding for "Public and Indian Housing--Revitalization of Severely Distressed Public Housing (Hope VI)" by $100 million (by offset).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 360 (Roll no. 283).
